summary: Contoso Wireless offers the latest model in their flagship line of phones with a large screen, high-speed processor, and top-of-the-line camera. They offer several plans and packages to fit any budget, as well as discounts for customers who sign up for multiple lines or bundle their services. The product phone also comes with a one year warranty, and customers can purchase an extended warranty for additional coverage. Contoso Wireless provides 24/7 customer service and complimentary setup services for all new devices purchased. Orders typically arrive within 2-3 business days, but expedited shipping options are available.
